benefits.title: Revolutionize Your Coaching with
benefits.availability.title: 24/7 Availability
benefits.availability.description: Your AI chatbot works round the clock, providing instant support and guidance to your clients anytime, anywhere.
benefits.personalizedLearning.title: Personalized Learning
benefits.personalizedLearning.descriptio: Tailor your chatbot's responses to the client's unique needs, ensuring a customized coaching experience.
benefits.scalableImpact.title: Scalable Impact
benefits.scalableImpact.description: Reach and assist thousands of clients simultaneously without compromising on quality or personal touch.
benefits.passiveIncome.title: Passive Income
benefits.passiveIncome.description: Generate recurring revenue through subscriptions, allowing you to earn while you sleep or focus on high-value activities.
benefits.quickLaunch.title: Quick Launch
benefits.quickLaunch.description: Set up your AI chatbot in minutes, not months. Start monetizing your expertise faster than ever before.
benefits.dataInsights.title: Data-Driven Insights
benefits.dataInsights.description: Gain valuable insights into your clients' needs and behaviors, helping you refine your coaching strategies.
pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.chooseCharge: Choose how much you charge your users ( Min BotWhirl fee 5€ / user )
pricing.automaticCharge: We automatically charge your user monthly
hero.title: Turn your Expertise into
hero.description: BotWhirl empowers coaches to create AI-powered chatbots, monetize their knowledge, and provide 24/7 value to subscribers.

howItWorks.steps.1.description: Easily set your the price of your subscription to start generating revenue.
howItWorks.steps.2.title: Expand Your Reach
howItWorks.steps.2.description: Promote your bot effectively and watch your subscriber base grow exponentially.
